name: Vegetarian's Burguer (Kw MoLoGa Jam 2022)
description:
Vegetarian's Burger It's a Platformer 2D with the objective of killing vegetables (or fruits) and saving the world, this game takes place in Rio Grande do Norte (Brazil)

the Game Jam that Vegetarian's Burger is running is: Kw MoLoGa Jam 2022

You control the Farmer, the atk are you throw the hoe and you have double jump

The Vegetarian's Burguer have 5 bosses, most are easy

This Game are made in Godot

And are created by the guys on FAXNEX Studio

The platforms available for you to download the game are Android, Windows and Linux, but for HTML they are all

CREDITS

Programmer: BANANOT

Spriters: BANANOT, Biker, Emilio and minimufffin

Music Makers: Emilio and minimufffin

Beta Testers: Everyone, guilherme cousin programmer, jordsoN And GarbageMonkey

When the Vegetarian's Burguer are created: February 22, 2022

When the Vegetarian's Burguer Page are created: February 27, 2022
